entry.dcterms:description: population time budget in Győr, data analyses within the framework of a cross-national comparative research
entry.dcterms:subject: cultural activities and participation
time use
censuses
social behaviour and attitudes
society and culture
household
survey data
cross-section

Households with -at least one- non-agricultural active wage-earner make up the sample. One from among the 18-65-year old family members has been selected for observation with the help of a given key. 1300 persons from Győr, 700 persons from eight neighbouring villages.
self-administered questionnaire
A
